Overview

"Looks like whoever closed the play place for the night forgot I was in here. Better find some way out quick, who knows what kind of immediate dangers lurk within a fast food play place... There's gotta be some way to figure out the door's combination in here somewhere, so let's start looking. Although... this places seems a little bigger than I remember...."
